body_html:
Oh ok (generally patch are not in the java part, mostly in the compilation scripts).

It looks like Bazel just completed perfectly. /cc @lberki in case he has more understanding of the grpc-command message.

Anyway if the server restart, with the bug I recently fixed on Bazel and without #7575, you will do the configuration step at each build :(, we are trying to cut a Bazel release and our CI has been green today so we should be able to cut one tomorrow.

body:
Oh ok (generally patch are not in the java part, mostly in the compilation scripts).

It looks like Bazel just completed perfectly. /cc @lberki in case he has more understanding of the grpc-command message.

Anyway if the server restart, with the bug I recently fixed on Bazel and without #7575, you will do the configuration step at each build :(, we are trying to cut a Bazel release and our CI has been green today so we should be able to cut one tomorrow.
